mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN stay s ON r.reservation_code = s.reservation_code WHERE r.checkin_date = #{today} AND r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND r.canceled_at IS NULL AND s.stay_code IS NULL

SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s INNER JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code WHERE r.checkout_date = #{today} AND r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND s.actual_checkin_at IS NOT NULL AND s.actual_checkout_at IS NULL
